name: Kehai Chen
content: Kehai Chen 陈科海 (Chen, Kehai) I have been a professor in the School of Computer Science and Technology at Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen, China, since October 2023. My research interests focus on Natural Language Processing, AI Agents, and Multi-modal generation. I have published more than 90 papers in top-tier NLP/ML/AI conferences and journals, such as ACL, NeurIPS, ICLR, AAAI, IJCAI, TPAMI, TASLP, etc. E-mail: chenkehai AT hit.edu.cn; chenkehai AT gmail.com [中文主页] Looking for self-motivated Ph.D. students (2026), Master students (2026), and Undergraduate students who want to engage in machine translation and NLP research. Please send your CV to me by email if you want to join us.
